banner.title: We value your privacy
banner.description: We use cookies and similar technologies to provide you with the best possible experience, analyze usage, and assist with our marketing efforts. You can accept all cookies or customize your preferences.
banner.legalNotice: By continuing to use our website, you acknowledge that you have read and understood our Privacy Policy and Cookie Policy.

preferences.title: Cookie Preferences
preferences.description: Manage your cookie and privacy preferences. You can review and change your choices at any time.
preferences.retention: How long do we keep it?
preferences.footer: You can change your preferences at any time by clicking the cookie settings link in our footer.

strictlyNecessary.title: Strictly Necessary
strictlyNecessary.description: These cookies are essential for the website to function and cannot be switched off.

functional.title: Functional
functional.description: These cookies allow enhanced functionality and personalization.

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website.

marketing.title: Marketing
marketing.description: These cookies track your online activity to help deliver more relevant advertising.
